data.title: Guess What?! November Issue of Truckin Magazine!!!
data.meta_description:
Hey all,

Just wanted to say I remembered that Birdman (?) or possibly some Vendor posted a picture and hinted that the Raptor would take its 2nd Cover of...
data.text:
Oct 21, 2013

Reaction score

TEXAS

Hey all,

Just wanted to say I remembered that Birdman (?) or possibly some Vendor posted a picture and hinted that the Raptor would take its 2nd Cover of Truckin Magazine for the November Issue. That said, I went out and bought TWO copies for me and my truck haha!

So get them while their Hot! Here's a pic (x2) after I pic picked them up at B&N.

Attachments

Truckin (1).jpg

Truckin (2).jpg

Grieving.................

A tremendous loss. We followed that build from stock for years....... and feel bad for Chris and those who spent so much time and energy making that tragic work of art. Very sad. R.I.P.

Oct 22, 2013

I am sure Chris will build another truck. I have a copy of the issue and its a keeper along with a bunch of photos I got at Glenn Helen, along with some of a couple of parts I machined for Chris, lots of folks put lots of time into that Truck and I think everyone is really proud of the final product. not much else to say but it's gone and I bet the next one will be even better.

Oct 22, 2013

When I saw it on the newsstand I had to take a pic of the cover.

Ironic that the magazine came out just after the truck passed away.

RIP "King of the Raptors" (that's not the name it went by around these parts).

I know a lot of people and companies put quite a bit of manpower, time, and materials into helping build that truck. I hope they all were taken care of since they can't get any promotional value from it.

Attachments

Truckin mag cover King of the Raptors.jpg
